Package com.cognizant.utilities

Class DriverSetup

java.lang.Object
com.cognizant.utilities.DriverSetup
public class DriverSetup extends Object
This class is used to create and manage the WebDriver instance, which is used to perform test automations.

  • Method Details

    • setDriver

      public void setDriver​(String browser, String platform, String environment, Map<String,​Object>... optPreference) throws org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException, MalformedURLException
      Used to set the WebDriver instance to be used for automation. Set's the driver instance for both local and remote or selenium grid automations.
      Parameters:
      browser - Browser name for which driver instance is set for. Currently supported browsers chrome, edge, firefox.
      platform - Operating system, on which automation would run.
      environment - Takes either of two values - local for running automation locally and remote for running instance using Selenium Grid.
      optPreference - Optional browser configuration parameters.
      Throws:
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException - If a browser is not installed on the system.
      MalformedURLException
